Verses: 1 livyaadhaanai Thoondilinaal Pidikkakkoodumo? Adhin Naakkai Nee Vidugira Kayitrinaale Pidikkakkoodumo?
2 adhin Mookkai Naarkkayirupottuk Kattakkoodumo? Kurattinaal Adhin Thaadaiyai Uruvak Kuththakkoodumo?
3 adhu Unnaip Paarththu Anega Vinnappancheyyumo? Unnai Nokki Ichchaga Vaarththaigalai Sollumo?
4 adhu Unnode Udanpadikkaipannumo? Adhai Sadhaakaalamum Adimaikolvaayo?
5 oru Kuruviyode Vilaiyaadugiradhupol, Nee Adhanode Vilaiyaadi, Adhai Nee Un Penmakkalandaiyile Kattivaippaayo?
6 koottaaligal Adhaip Pidikkap Prayaththanappattu, Adhai Viyaabaarigalukkup Pangiduvaargalo?
7 nee Adhin Tholai Anega Ambugalinaalum, Adhin Thalaiyai Erivallaiyangalinaalum Erivaayo?
8 adhinmel Un Kaiyaippodu, Yuththaththai Ninaiththukkol; Ini Appadi Seyyath Thuniyamaattaai.
9 idho, Adhaip Pidikkalaam Endru Nambinavan Mosampoi, Adhaip Paarththavudane Vizhuvaan Allavo?
10 adhai Ezhuppaththakka Dhairiyavaan Illaadhirukka, Enakku Munbaaga Nirpavan Yaar?
11 thanakkup Padhil Kodukkappadumpadi, Mundhi Enakkuk Koduththavan Yaar? Vaanaththin Keezhullavaigal Ellaam Ennudaiyavaigal.
12 adhin Angangalum, Adhin Veeriyamum, Adhin Udal Isaivin Nerththiyum Innadhendru Naan Sollaamal Maraikkamaatten.
13 adhu Moodiyirukkira Adhin Porvaiyaik Kilappakkoodiyavan Yaar? Adhin Irandu Thaadaigalin Naduve Kadivaalam Podaththakkavan Yaar?
14 adhin Mugaththin Kadhavaith Thirakkakkoodiyavan Yaar? Sutrilumirukkira Adhin Parkal Bayangaramaanavaigal.
15 muththiraip Padhippuppola Azhuththankondu Adarththiyaayirukkira Adhin Parisaigalin Aranippu Magaa Sirappaayirukkiradhu.
16 avaigal Naduve Kaatrum Pugamaattaadha Nerukkamaai Avaigal Ondrodondru Inaikkappattirukkiradhu.
17 avaigal Ondrodondru Ottikkondu Inaipiriyaamal Pidiththukkondirukkiradhu.
18 adhu Thummugaiyil Oliveesum; Adhin Kangal Arunodhayaththin Puruvangalaippol Irukkiradhu.
19 adhin Vaayilirundhu Erigira Pandhangal Purappattu, Akkinipporigal Parakkum.
20 kodhikkira Sattiyilum Kopparaiyilum Irundhu Purappadugiradhupola, Adhin Naasigalilirundhu Pugai Purappadum.
21 adhin Suvaasam Karigalaik Koluththum, Adhin Vaayilirundhu Juvaalai Purappadum.
22 adhin Kazhuththile Belan Kudikondirukkum; Bayangaram Adharkumun Kooththaadum.
23 adhin Udarkoorugal, Asaiyaadha Kettiyaai Ondrodondru Ottikkondirukkum.
24 adhin Nenju Kallaippolavum, Endhiraththin Adikkallaippolavum Kettiyaayirukkum.
25 adhu Ezhumbumpodhu Balasaaligal Anji Bayaththinaal Mayangith Thigaippaargal.
26 adhaith Thaakkugiravanudaiya Pattayam, Eetti, Vallaiyam, Kavasam, Ondrum Adharkumun Nirkaadhu.
27 adhu Irumbai Vaikkolaagavum, Vengalaththai Uluththa Maramaagavum Ennum.
28 ambu Adhaith Thuraththaadhu; Kavankarkal Adharkuth Thurumbaagum.
29 adhu Perunthadigalaith Thaaladigalaaga Enni, Eettiyin Asaivai Igazhum.
30 adhin Keezhaagak Koormaiyaana Karkal Kidandhaalum, Adhu Setrinmel Odugiradhupolak Karukkaana Avaigalinmelum Odum.
31 adhu Aazhaththai Ulaippaanaiyaippol Pongappanni, Kadalaith Thailampolak Kalakkividum.
32 adhu Thanakkup Pinnaagap Paadhaiyaith Thulangappannum; Aazhamaanadhu Veluppaana Naraiyaippol Vilangum.
33 boomiyinmel Adharku Oppaanadhu Ondrumillai; Adhu Nirppayamaayirukka Undupannappattadhu.
34 adhu Mettimaiyaanadhaiyellaam Arpamaai Ennugiradhu; Adhu Agangaaramulla Jeevangalukkellaam Raajaavaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
